bitwarden.title: Bitwarden
bitwarden.description: Bitwarden is an open source password manager for personal or busines use. Data is encrypted locally on your device, rather than on a cloud-server, so your data is safe from any potential attacks that Bitwarden as a company might face!

antivirus.title: Malwarebytes
antivirus.description: A popular anti-malware softare for most modern operating systems. Helps protect you against various types of malware by scanning your PC and webrowser for active or potential threats.

vpn.title: Express VPN
vpn.description: A popular VPN for spoofing your IP Address. You can use this to hide your internet traffic and remain anonymous online.
